title: Who is Zico Kolter? A Professor Leads OpenAI Safety Panel With Power to Halt Unsafe AI Releases

content.raw: Kolter leads a panel at OpenAI that has the authority to halt the ChatGPT makerâ€™s release of new AI systems if it finds them unsafe. The post Who is Zico Kolter? A Professor Leads OpenAI Safety Panel With Power to Halt Unsafe AI Releases appeared first on SecurityWeek.
